definitions.definition: A word used in (especially sadomasochistic ) sexual practices to unambiguously indicate that a participant actually desires the activity to cease and is not merely feigning a lack of consent .

main_definition: ( chiefly BDSM ) A word used in (especially sadomasochistic ) sexual practices to unambiguously indicate that a participant actually desires the activity to cease and is not merely feigning a lack of consent .
